Package game.weapons

Class GiantClaw

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
game.weapons.GiantClaw
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Weapon
public class GiantClaw extends WeaponItem
A enemy weapon that can only be used by enemy (GiantDog) and it extends from WeaponItem to achieve DRY principle
See Also:
